full_summary:
**Notice of Invitation to Tender (ITT)**

### Furniture for Workspaces

**Contract Reference Number:** cb-400-29014620  
**Modification Number:** 5  
**Invitation Number:** R0000158783  
**Publication Date:** January 26, 2024  
**Tender Closing Date:** February 6, 2024, at 14:00:00  
**Modification Date:** February 6, 2024  
**Expected Contract Start Date:** January 26, 2024  
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024  

### Overview

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Supplier's Furniture for Workspaces Supply Arrangement (SA) for the procurement of furniture. This RFP is issued in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Supplier's SA. Bidders submitting a proposal agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of the Supplier's SA and the terms and conditions outlined in this RFP.

### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering  
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price  
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada  
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Canada  

### Pre-qualified Bidders

To be eligible to submit a bid, bidders must be pre-qualified under the Supplier's Furniture for Workspaces Supply Arrangement (SA).

### Documents and Related Materials

Tender documents can be accessed at:

*   [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/30536/r158783-english-%28amd-1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30536/r158783-english-%28amd-1.pdf)  
*   [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/30536/r158783-english_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/30536/r158783-english_1.pdf)

### Contact Information

For questions and concerns regarding this ITT, please contact:

*   Julie Dessureault  
*   Email: [julie.dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.dessureault@ssc-spc.gc.ca)  
*   Phone: (613) 608-3114
